header.class: bg-transparent fixed lowercase top-0 z-20 h-90 w-full px-20 lg:px-40 flex transition-colors duration-500

div.class: mx-auto w-full max-w-1280 flex justify-between items-center text-black100
group cursor-pointer px-20 py-10 first:pl-0 last:pr-0
py-20 invisible group-hover:visible absolute transform -translate-x-24 cursor-default

a.class: bg-white shadow-menu rounded-full w-fit-content block py-12 px-24 mb-10
bg-white shadow-menu rounded-full w-fit-content block py-12 px-24 mb-10
bg-white shadow-menu rounded-full w-fit-content block py-12 px-24 mb-10
bg-white shadow-menu rounded-full w-fit-content block py-12 px-24 mb-10

nav.class: hidden bg-white px-20 fixed z-10 items-center top-0 bottom-0 left-0 right-0 overflow-y-scroll

a.class: hidden lg:flex items-center px-10 z-10 fixed bottom-half left-0 transform -translate-x-30 -rotate-90

div.class: hidden lg:block p-5 z-10 fixed top-half transform -translate-y-half right-25 space-y-30

section.class: flex flex-col justify-center items-center w-full px-15 lg:px-80 pt-100 pb-36 xxs:pb-70 xs:pt-100 xs:pb-120 sm:pt-140 sm:pb-200 md:pt-170 md:pb-250 lg:pt-200 lg:pb-420

h1.class: font-heading text-88 xs:text-130 sm:text-180 md:text-250 lg:text-300 text-transparent text-stroke

p.class: text-center text-24 xs:text-30 sm:text-36 md:text-48 leading-10 mb-24 xs:mb-32 sm:mb-40 md:mb-55

div.class: flex flex-col items-center space-y-16 md:space-y-0 md:flex-row md:space-x-64 font-heading uppercase text-12

footer.class: flex flex-col flex-shrink-0 lg:mx-80 mt-50 lg:mt-100

div.class: bg-black100 text-white px-16 pt-64 pb-50 mx-auto w-full self-center max-w-1480 flex flex-col relative sm:px-100 sm:pt-100 sm:pb-64
mb-32 text-transparent font-heading heading-strong-white text-stroke-white h2-large sm:mb-60

label.class: absolute top-12 w-full pointer-events-none transition-all duration-200 text-cloud
absolute top-12 w-full pointer-events-none transition-all duration-200 text-cloud
absolute top-12 w-full pointer-events-none transition-all duration-200 text-cloud
label.span: And how can we help you?

textarea.name: message
textarea.class: block w-full resize-none outline-none border-b py-10 leading-6 sm:py-7 sm:leading-9 border-black200

div.class: bg-transparent border absolute left-0 top-0 h-20 w-20 flex justify-center items-center border-darkgray

label.p: I have read and understand Applifting's Candidates Privacy Notice.

button.class: flex font-heading tracking-wider disabled:cursor-default border border-white text-white text-9 sm:text-11

div.class: bg-black absolute w-45/100 h-550 max-w-600 pt-64 pb-135 top-0 right-0 hidden xl:block
w-100 sm:w-150 h-full absolute top-0 left-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-black100 flex z-10 pointer-events-none transition-opacity duration-500 opacity-0

svg.class: transform rotate-180 w-30 sm:w-55 fill-current pointer-events-auto

div.class: w-155 relative sm:w-175 flex-shrink-0 mr-15 sm:mr-40

p.class: uppercase tracking-extra-wide text-12 sm:text-14 whitespace-pre-wrap absolute bottom-305 sm:max-w-135 sm:bottom-365 sm:text-14

div.class: mt-14 mb-6 text-12 sm:text-14 uppercase tracking-wide
w-155 relative sm:w-175 flex-shrink-0 mr-15 sm:mr-40

w-100 sm:w-150 h-full absolute top-0 right-0 bg-gradient-to-l from-black100 flex pointer-events-none transition-opacity duration-500 opacity-100
text-darkgray space-y-64 xs:space-y-0 xs:grid xs:grid-cols-2 xs:gap-y-80 xs:gap-x-20 sm:gap-x-36 md:gap-y-36 md:grid-cols-3 text-14 leading-10

div.p:
River Garden Office
Rohanské nábřeží 19
Praha 8 180 00

div.class: flex flex-col space-y-10 sm:self-end xxl:space-y-0 xxl:flex-row xxl:space-x-30
flex flex-col space-y-10 sm:self-end xxl:space-y-0 xxl:flex-row xxl:space-x-30
text-darkgray relative pl-64 flex flex-col xs:col-span-2 sm:col-span-1 md:pl-0 md:grid md:grid-rows-3

svg.class: w-30 absolute md:static left-0 top-4 fill-current text-white

div.class: ul-flex li-margin text-12 whitespace-no-wrap md:self-end md:leading-4 xl:mr-0
